website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive choice for those seeking a quilted,  lightweight jacket with adequate weather coverage.
pros: Jacket is quilted for attractive design
V-neck design allows for easy layering underneath jacket
cons: Feathers tend to come out of the jacket

customer_reviews.title: Great for 'cool' not cold weather.
customer_reviews.text: In my own ignorance, I thought all, or most, puffy jackets with the 90/10 down filling were made for really cold weather. Sadly this one is not. A few of the 'squares' of filling seemed almost empty. I know now that in addition to the type of filling, the amount of filling is also very important. This is a great product for cool weather (high 50s to 60s). It's super light weight, compact and very comfortable. But I need something for cold weather so it didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Unhapplily Happy

customer_reviews.title: the zipper is plastic
customer_reviews.text: I have this jacket in 4 colors and the size is true. I gave it 4 stars because the zipper is plastic and sometimes opens up from the bottom, but I have always been able to fix it. However it is a great value for the price. Many down jackets are just too warm, this one layers nicely over a sweater and is perfect for temps in the 40's and 50's when you don't need one of those expensive "arctic" down coats.
customer_reviews.author: Andric

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Warm wore as liner. 40f degree temp. Have feathers coming out Good for the price. Its warm but wore only as as liner over my outdoor jacket. Temp below or at 40 using this jacket won't be enough
customer_reviews.author: Ice

customer_reviews.title: The BEST puffer jacket
customer_reviews.text: The BEST puffer jacket! Bought a small 5'4" 125lbs athletic build. Best fall, spring time jacket. Lightweight, can take anywhere and easy to pack. Get one (or more)! So soft and easy to wear and it is a pretty jacket.
customer_reviews.author: KMAC

customer_reviews.title: Is comfy and looks pretty good. I'd recommend it to anyone looking for ...
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight but warm. Is comfy and looks pretty good. I'd recommend it to anyone looking for a light quilted jacket for the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Cho

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lovely jacket! It only lasts for about 4 months with heavy usage, but you get your money's worth!
customer_reviews.author: Natty Lite

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a cycling adventure!
customer_reviews.text: It's just the weight I wanted. It packs in its own little stuff sack. It fits just right. I need it for a big cycling adventure and it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Rita S Brown

customer_reviews.title: Too soon to review
customer_reviews.text: Amazon is asking for a review and I've worn the jacket once. I like it so far. Its super light and easy to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: This is not spectacular by any means, but its exactly what it says it is. I like the ability to zip it into a pouch and its slick, rainjacket-like feel. Its not particularly warm, but I didnt expect or want it to be. It will help block wind and is eventually disposable since it is not super high quality. Fit is good, zipper works well, overall a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Williams

customer_reviews.title: Nice and warm!
customer_reviews.text: Really surprised with how light weight this jacket is. Surprisingly enough even though it is lightweight it's very warm. This jacket is not overly bulky or puffy but does the job perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: FireWitch1

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket,  great price 5
customer_reviews.text: Such a great jacket! It fits perfectly with a little room to wear layers under. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Nice cut and weight
customer_reviews.text: This looks nice on. The pouch is a little too small to hold the jacket. I haven’t tried it somewhere cold yet so I am not sure if it will keep you warm.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Warm enough but light
customer_reviews.text: This is a light enough jacket to layer another or layer beneath. I used for a trip to Utah and it comes with a sleeve to stuff your jacket into so it doubles as a pillow on the plane.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous female

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Plastic Look
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a gift and only paid about $15. Looks like a cheap plastic bag. Returned it and bought a way better one for $40 on Lands End.
customer_reviews.author: lc

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I just received the jacket. I try it on and fitted perfectly, nice color and had the flash deal, love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Star Lily

product_meta.title: XPOSURZONE Women Packable Down Quilted Jacket Lightweight Puffer Coat
product_meta.description:
XPOSURZONE Women Packable Down Quilted Jacket Lightweight Puffer Coat

About XPOSURZONE 
XPOSURZONE is a professional manufacturer of cold weather outwear, especially ultralight down jackets. We produce a wide range of jackets, vests, blankets, and other cold weather apparel, using the best quality, highest performing materials. Our premium down is incredibly lofty, weighs practically nothing, and amazingly compressible.

Product Details 
This down jacket is thin and light, yet incredibly warm. The innovative shell material is densely woven to keep rain out. A high, fitted collar plus elastic cuffs help keep drafts out. Slightly nipped in waist creates a visual slimming effect. Elastic band binding at bottom hem seals out cold and wind. Quilt-through design reduces pack size. Pack it compactly into the included carrying pouch, so you can take it with you wherever you go. It's suitable for outdoor and sportswear: golf, hiking, climbing, traveling, riding, driving, walking, casual and other sports


Detail Sizing information(inch): 
SIZE XS:Shoulder(15.00)Chest(37)Sleeve(32.0)Bottom(38)Length(23.5) 
SIZE S :Shoulder(15.50)Chest(39)Sleeve(32.5)Bottom(40)Length(24) 
SIZE M :Shoulder(16.00)Chest(41)Sleeve(33.0)Bottom(42)Length(24.5) 
SIZE L :Shoulder(16.75)Chest(44)Sleeve(33.5)Bottom(45)Length(25) 
SIZE XL:Shoulder(17.50)Chest(47)Sleeve(34.0)Bottom(48)Length(25.5) 
Attention: 
Size Disclaimer : 
Our size is in US version.While the size is measured by hands, so please understand that there might exist a little bit unavoidable mistake.It is better to check the size chart below to choose the most suitable size according to your own detail measurements: shoulder,chest,sleeve,length. 
Color Disclaimer: 
As different computers display colors differently,the color of the actual item may vary slightly from the above images.
feature_bullets: Color-matched packable pouth inclued,easy to carry
Fashional V-neck design and ultra thin design,suitable for dressing undercoat; On-seamside-entry zipper pockets with flap
Ultralight down vest featuring square quilting and snaps closure
Lightweight and warm-keeping, XPOSURZONE down vest is suitable for outdoor and sports wear:golf,hiking,climbing,traveling,riding,driving,walking,casual and other sports
